templates.description: Requires one data column for X values and one for Y values.

templates.title: Bubble chart
templates.description: Requires three data columns: one for X values, one for Y values and one for the size of the bubble (Z value).

templates.description: Requires two data columns: one for slice names (shown in data labels) and one for their values.
